languages.text: "Ты можешь отправиться со мной, но остатки команды будут умерщвлены. Этих людей уже не спасти — в них скверна Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: "Ты можешь отправиться со мной, но остатки команды будут умерщвлены. Этих людей уже не спасти — в них скверна Хаоса".

languages.text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."
languages.original_text: "Ты можешь отправиться со мной, но остатки команды будут умерщвлены. Этих людей уже не спасти — в них скверна Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."
"You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."
"You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."
"You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."
"You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."

languages.text: 「私と来てもいいが残りのクルーは排除する必要がある。彼らはもはや救う余地が残されていない。全員渾沌に穢されてしまっている」
languages.original_text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: 「私と来てもいいが残りのクルーは排除する必要がある。彼らはもはや救う余地が残されていない――全員渾沌に穢されてしまっている」

languages.text: “你可以跟我一起来，但剩下的船员必须处决。这些人遭到了混沌的腐化，已经无药可救了。”
languages.original_text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: “你可以跟我一起来，但剩下的船员必须处决。这些人遭到了混沌的腐化，已经无药可救了。”

languages.text: «Puede acompañarme, pero los restos de la tripulación deben ser erradicados. No podemos salvar a esta gente. Está corrompida por el Caos».
languages.original_text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: «Puede acompañarme, pero los restos de la tripulación deben ser erradicados. No podemos salvar a esta gente. Está corrompida por el Caos».

languages.text: « Vous pouvez m'accompagner, mais ce qu'il reste de votre équipage sera exécuté. Ces gens ne peuvent pas être sauvés, ils ont été corrompus par le Chaos. »
languages.original_text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez m'accompagner, mais ce qu'il reste de votre équipage sera exécuté. Ces gens ne peuvent pas être sauvés, ils ont été corrompus par le Chaos. »

languages.text: "Ihr könnt mitkommen, aber der Rest der Crew wird terminiert. Diese Leute sind nicht mehr zu retten – das Chaos hat sie verderbt."
languages.original_text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt mitkommen, aber der Rest der Crew wird terminiert. Diese Leute sind nicht mehr zu retten – das Chaos hat sie verderbt."

languages.text: "Sen benimle gelebilirsin, mürettebatın kalanıysa yok edilecek. Bu insanlar kurtarılamayacak durumda. Kaos tarafından yozlaştırılmışlar."
languages.original_text: "You can come with me, but the remnants of the crew will be terminated. These people are beyond salvation — they're corrupted by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Sen benimle gelebilirsin ancak mürettebatın geri kalanı yok edilecek. Bu insanlar kurtarılamayacak durumda. Kaos tarafından yozlaştırılmışlar."
